question: What are the benefits and features of the machine learning program?
reference_answer: The machine learning program offers 18 hours of live, interactive sessions and 10 hours of step-by-step coding instructions. Participants will also get to work on a final project, complete 100 coding assignments, and gain access to the source code of a working production system. Other benefits include access to a private community for collaboration, direct access to the instructor, lifetime access to all past and future cohorts, and a program certificate upon completion. Participants only need to pay once to join the program, with no monthly or annual fees.

question: What are the topics covered in the second session of the course?
reference_answer: The second session of the course covers topics such as data cleaning, feature engineering, vectorization techniques, normalization and standardization, handling and interpreting missing values, choosing the best model, random baselines, the zero-rule algorithm, overfitting, hyperparameter tuning, experiment tracking, measuring the quality of your holdout set, and an introduction to distributed training using data parallelism and model parallelism.
